Perceptor/Kup/Windlord

=E2=80=9CHe had=E2=80=9D said  Perceptor who had in=
troduced to the meeting room =E2=80=9CThe BlackFortress was energiced by th=
e Volcano=E2=80=99s mamga, but now with the Black Fortress gone Hydras will=
 run out of reacurces sooner of later=E2=80=9D


Kup and Windlord looked at=
 Perceptor not sure if they had to tell him be gone or remain quiet
From: S=
andy Panico 
Sent: Tuesday, July 12, 2011 10:08 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.c=
om 
Subject: Re: Changing times (Cue: All Maximals & Autobots)




Quickstr=
ide arrives with Windlord and Uproar back in the meeting room as they take =
their places once again.  Quickstride wanted very much to stay put at the r=
iver bank, with Windlord , but duty did come first.

" I promise we'll go b=
ack there after the meeting is officially over.  I saw something there that=
 I want to investigate, a possible location for a portable wind powered ene=
rgy turbine. "

Uproar looks to Quickstride and Windlord. He was very much =
interested in the concept of generating clean and efficient power, without =
harming the environment.

" Hey I'm all for that if ya need help, guys. Wai=
t a sec...  Quickstride, that idea of yours, do you realize how much power =
that turbine is gonna give us once you get it up and running?  Enough ta cr=
eate a sizable shield and weapon system for the Ark...  Dude, that's huge! =
 That's something the Preds don't have!  Go on, tell Leo Prime, man if that=
 turbine project is a go, like Rodimus said it is, imagine how many lives y=
ou're gonna save."

He nudges his equine friend with a gentile paw.  Quicks=
tride nods and transforms into robot mode.  Usually a very modest fellow, h=
e walks up to Leo Prime, with a holographic image of a wind turbine, comple=
tely portable, resting. In a recessed rockface of a near by cave, etched in=
 a very tall mountain which is surrounded by dense forest land appearing un=
touched as the turbine powers itself with wind and uses a hydro turbine sys=
tem as backup.

" Leo Prime, Sir, if I could I have something to show you, =
that could very well enable us to protect the parameter, environment, wildl=
ife, and  Natural habitats that have established themselves here.  All we n=
eed are the energy resources to pull it off.  I think I have something here=
 that will enable us to do it all.  It's a turbine that runs on wind with a=
n extension that runs on water as a backup power source when there isn't an=
y wind being generated.  Best part is, it's completely portable and designe=
d for quick disassembly so we can leave the planet as we find it, completel=
y untouched."

He shows Leo Prime a simulation of the workings of his inven=
tion.

Tucson Prime arrives with Talon, just in time to hear the proposed i=
dea by Quickstride.

" A power source running only on wind and hydro electr=
icity.  Simple, yet natural, without harming the ecological balance of this=
 planet.  And did I hear you correctly, Quickstride?  Could that turbine gi=
ve us enough power to protect and supply our reserves with enough natural e=
nergy to fend off our enemies sufficiently? " 

Quickstride grins modestly.=


" Well there is a lot of testing that'll have ta be done, but if it works=
 like I hope it'll work, it could, yeah definitely, it would give us the ho=
me team advantage.  But as I show it in this simulation, location is everyt=
hing.  I know where I need to position this system and all I need is some h=
elp to transport and assemble the turbine system.  I made sure to design it=
 with light, but sturdy materials, just in case."

Tucson nods and turns to=
 Leo Prime.  

" I think this is something we should strongly consider.  Wh=
en Rodimus and the others get here, we'll resume the meeting as you intende=
d to,  Leo Prime.  Quickstride, what you have here is something highly valu=
able.  Why didn't you propose this earlier?"

Quickstride looks to Tucson m=
odestly.

Well, I didn't wanna interrupt Leo Prime or any of you guys.. "

=
Tucson shuffles Quickstride up front where all the leaders sit during impor=
tant meetings.  Uproar gives his buddy a thumbs up.

" Way ta go Quickstrid=
e.  You're part of the house now."

Tucson gives Quickstride his seat.

" N=
ow as soon as Rodimus and the rest of the team gets here, I want them to se=
e and hear your proposal for the turbine system you're designing.  And plea=
se, don't be shy.  You have something Hydas doesn't have, a perpetual and n=
atural energy resource, plus the means to access it in a harmless manner.  =
Leo, we need all the energy we can gather and this is our best shot of gett=
ing it."

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Jul 12, 2011, a=
t 3:42 AM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:


    
  Talo=
n/Windlord:

  windlotd sighed he didnt liked to to come back so soon but h=
e didnt said anythinng and mount up.

  ************************
  Talon si=
ghed and she followed Tucson



  From: Sandy Panico 
  Sent: Monday, July =
11, 2011 12:33 PM
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Subject: Re: Changing tim=
es (Cue: All Maximals & Autobots)




  Quickstride perks up his ears with =
a sheepish grin on his face, looking innocently forgetful about not going b=
ack to the meeting.

  "Oops!  I knew I was forgetting something, sorry Sir=
, bad short term memory, won't happen again I promise.  Right, back to the =
meeting, I'll be right there in no time flat.  Hold on Windlord, gonna have=
 ta haul hooves back to the meeting room. "

  Quickstride quickly canters =
back to the Ark to return to the meeting, running into Uproar as he too, bo=
unds back into the Ark.

  " I had a feeling the meeting wasn't over yet.  =
At least I can say that Tucson sent me ta do a favor for him."

  Quickstri=
de nods.

  " So did I but I took a little more time than allowed."

  It d=
oesn't take them long to return to the meeting room. 

  Meanwhile, Tucson =
receives the message and replies as he still holds Talon gently in his arms=
.  He too is caught slightly off guard.

  " Leo Prime, yes sorry I thought=
 everyone could use some time out and I lost track of time..  Also, had a l=
ittle processor disturbance, and I needed a little time to reboot.  I'm fin=
e now, I'll be there with Talon shortly.  Sorry Talon, Leo Prime is right, =
we need to go back."  

  Meanwhile, Straight Shot gets the message to retu=
rn to the meeting and steps out, clearing a tear from her optics as she nea=
rly gets grazed by Rodimus.

  " Ohh, sorry!"

  Perpetually on the move an=
d constantly busy. 

  On Jul 11, 2011, at 7:28 AM, Super Cyclonus <supercy=
clonus@...> wrote:


      
    As Quickstride and Windlord move arou=
nd outside LORD ELDER came over
    to thier location, his alt mode that of=
 a large dog with brown and
    black spots. However now there was metallic=
 armor as well, he was
    transmtealled. In this mode he moved easily over=
 the rough terrain to
    follow the two Maximals.

    As he arrived at th=
ier location he transfomred to robot mode.
    "Quickstride, you do realize=
 that the meeting never ended, but you
    just walked out of it?" LORDE EL=
DER looked at QUICKSTRIDE and then at
    WINDLORD, "Weren't we suppose to =
be retrieving Windlord and coming
    back?"

    -------------------------=
------

    There is a beep on TUSCON's comm center in his quarters. "Tusco=
n
    Prime." It is LEO PRIME's voice. "The meeting had not ended, why did
=
    you send your teams out and you retire to your quarters. Is there
    s=
omething going on that we all need to be aware of? And where is the
    res=
t of your team?" There is a note of concern in his voice as well as
    agi=
tation.

    -------------------------------

    RODIMUS PRIME drove throu=
gh the different halls of the ARK, using the
    its sensors as well as his=
 own to locate the wayward WHEELIE,
    "WHEELIE! Where are you?" He called=
 out as he zoomed in what he
    thought was his locatioons. "Wheelie!" He =
called again.

    -------------------------------

    In the room where t=
he meeting was still suppose to be taking place LEO
    PRIME was still loo=
king at the the bot with the predacon signature,
    still waiting for an a=
nswer to his last question.

    (TAG)

    Preston
